;;;34     static int _GetScrollPos(WM_HWIN hWin, int Id) {
000000  b5fe              PUSH     {r1-r7,lr}
000002  4605              MOV      r5,r0
000004  460e              MOV      r6,r1
;;;35       WM_SCROLL_STATE ScrollState = {0};
000006  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
000008  9000              STR      r0,[sp,#0]
00000a  9001              STR      r0,[sp,#4]
00000c  9002              STR      r0,[sp,#8]
;;;36       WM_HWIN hVScroll;
;;;37       hVScroll = WM_GetDialogItem(hWin, Id);
00000e  4631              MOV      r1,r6
000010  4628              MOV      r0,r5
000012  f7fffffe          BL       WM_GetDialogItem
000016  4604              MOV      r4,r0
;;;38       if (hVScroll) {
000018  b11c              CBZ      r4,|L3.34|
;;;39         WM_GetScrollState(hVScroll, &ScrollState);
00001a  4669              MOV      r1,sp

;;;41       return ScrollState.v;

;;;42     }
